original_text:
My people are destroyed for lack of knowledge;
    because you have rejected knowledge,
    I reject you from being a priest to me.
And since you have forgotten the law of your God,
    I also will forget your children.
korean_text: 내 백성이 지식이 없으므로 망하는도다 네가 지식을 버렸으니 나도 너를 버려 내 제사장이 되지 못하게 할 것이요 네가 네 하나님의 율법을 잊었으니 나도 네 자녀들을 잊어버리리라

sentences.original_text: My people are destroyed for lack of knowledge
I reject you from being a priest to me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 내 제사장으로 삼지 않겠다

sentences.original_text: And since you have forgotten the law of your God
I also will forget your children
